text: Takikh, kto vyzhidayet, chto sluchitsya s vami. Yesli s Gospodney pomoshch'yu vy pobedite, (Oni vam) skazhut: "Razve my ne byli tam s vami?" A kol' uspekh budet soputstvovat' nevernym, (Oni nevernym) skazhut: "Ne my l' staralis' vam pomoch' i zashchitit' ot vernykh?" Gospod' rassudit mezhdu vami V Den' Suda I nikogda nevernym ne dostavit Puti - nad vernymi torzhestvovat'
